channel.title: Running error [pi] 317
channel.description:
Ok, so I was changing the stats of an item in the item.cfg and I wanted to update it quick so i compiled and then tried to run, but the run didn't work... here is my error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:369) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:59) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
please be very detailed on what i should do, because i am not a good coder and i barely know java...
thanks!

item.title: Running error [pi] 317
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:3, topic:444476”]Usually caused by not following the format of the config file.

Use the Tab key instead of space bar.[/quote]Completely forgot about that also.

Read full topic

item.title: Running error [pi] 317
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Usually caused by not following the format of the config file.

Use the Tab key instead of space bar.

Read full topic

item.title: Running error [pi] 317
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[quote=“deathe1000, post:1, topic:444476”]Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17[/quote]It tells you the error right there. I guess you put too many in?

Read full topic
